propertyDefinition.name: MovingStatus
propertyDefinition.description: The Moving Status of the xray

propertyDefinition.name: TargetReached
propertyDefinition.description: True if not moving and current position is near enough to target position

propertyDefinition.name: NoFailure
propertyDefinition.description: True if there is no failure

propertyDefinition.name: ioInsertCmd
propertyDefinition.description: True to insert the xray (internal use only)

propertyDefinition.name: ioRetractCmd
propertyDefinition.description: True to retract the xray (internal use only)
